msg.msgText:
A "DestinationMappingRule" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create DestinationMappingRule help imaserver create DestinationMappingRule "Name=value" "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create DestinationMappingRule "Name=DestMapRule1" "QueueManagerConnection=QMConn1" "RuleType=1" "Source=Sourc1" "Destination=DestTopic1"
Configuration items for "DestinationMappingRule" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
